variables.description: The default padding used for most material design components.

usedBy.description:
A selector for creating a plain styled column. This is used to update all
the `md-table-column--data` in a `.md-data-table--plain` and to create a
`md-table-column--plain` class. The `white-space` will still need to manually
be changed from `nowrap` to `initial` if you want line wrapping.

context.name: md-table-column--plain

usedBy.description: Creates the styles for a column in a data table.

context.name: react-md-data-table-column

usedBy.description: Includes the styles for navigation drawers. This really depends on the styles for toolbars and drawers.

context.name: react-md-navigation-drawers

usedBy.description:
Includes the styles for the navigation drawer content on tablets.
This should be used within a media query.

Includes the styles for the navigation drawer content on desktop screens.
This should be used within a media query.

Includes the base styles for pickers. This is styles that is used for both date and time pickers.
This is normally used within the `react-md-pickers` mixin.

context.name: react-md-pickers-base
